about_the_game:
"Are you looking for something? Is it your lost memory, or... someone?
But your life has no beginning nor an ending. "

“However, eternal sleep is not necessarily death.”

“We've finally meet again, my mother.”
=======================================================

Immersive story experience
"SaGaS" is a game based on new Chinese grotesque Cthulhu theme, integrating the retro style and background settings of old Hong Kong in the 20th century. It is a fan project based on Scara-ei character shipping from Genshin Impact, and uses a movie-like narrative to show a story of destiny and constant struggle with obsession.

Exquisite animated CG
In the game, you will experience exquisite animated CG cutscenes, following the camera and atmosphere like an old movie, and immersing yourself in the story.

Featured puzzle maze gameplay
Each level has different theme features based on the Five Elements! Use the compass in your hand to break through the maze, complete the fragments of the maze, and find the way out.

Stylized unique art
The retro old Hong Kong style is combined with the textured paper-cut style to outline a story full of grotesque aesthetics.

content_descriptors.notes: Please be aware that this game contains some scary, gore, and other plots, which may cause discomfort.
